abstract: Characterization of Orlando, Fla, mass shooting as worst of its kind in United States history has prompted some to protest, saying other instances of deadly mass violence that have taken place in America's past are being overlooked; some in media have called for end to using superlative to describe Orlando incident.

headline.print_headline: Orlando Attack Brings Up History of U.S. Massacres
headline.main: Historians, Police and Others Argue What Makes Orlando Massacre ‘Worst’

snippet: Some have protested that describing the attack as the worst mass shooting in United States history ignores other acts of violence that may have claimed more lives.
lead_paragraph: Some have protested that describing the attack as the worst mass shooting in United States history ignores other acts of violence that may have claimed more lives.
